author: pquerna
msg: Update the Worker MPM+FreeBSD note.  It all works under FreeBSD 5.3/5-STABLE.

author: ekoneil
msg: There is a single type of style support right now.  It uses a base style name which can optionally be prefixed with a user-specified name.  The default style class names are in the format:
where foo can be header, footer, odd, or even when defining rows.  These can then be put into a CSS as:
and so on.  The "datagrid" prefix can be overridden with the <netui-data:dataGrid>'s cssClassPrefix attribute.  If set to foo, these styles will be:
Next step is to provide a style policy that allows for styles to simply be:
where there is no prefix required and the styles can be soped into a <div>.
Feedback welcome from those of you who do CSS things more often than I.  :)

author: pquerna
msg: mod_filter in 2.1 allows better ordering of the filter chain.
